data.title: List of Monarchs of Thailand
data.meta_description: Although the current Chakri Dynasty was created in 1782, the existence of the institution of monarchy in Thailand is traditionally considered to have its...
data.text:
Although the current Chakri Dynasty was created in 1782, the existence of the institution of monarchy in Thailand is traditionally considered to have its roots from the founding of the Sukhothai Kingdom in 1238, with a brief interregnum from the death of Ekkathat to the accession of Taksin in the 18th century. The institution was transformed into a constitutional monarchy in 1932.

Sukhothai:

1. Sri-inthrathit (1249 - ....)

2. Banmuang (.... - 1279)

3. Ramkhamhaeng the Great (1279 - 1298)

4. Loethai (1298 - ....)

5. Nguanamthom (..... - 1347)

6. Lithai or Thammaracha I (1347 - 1368)

7. Thammaracha II (1368 - 1399)

8. Thammaracha III (1399 - 1419)

9. Thammaracha IV (1419 - 1438)

Ayutthaya:

Ramathibodi I (1350 - 1369)

Ramesuan (1369 - 1370)

Borommaracha I (1370 - 1388)

Thonglan (1388)

Ramesuan (1388 - 1395)

Ramracha (1395 - 1409)

Intharacha (1409 - 1424)

Borommaracha II (1424 - 1448)

Borommatrailokkanat (1448 - 14889

Borommaracha III (1488 - 1491)

Ramathibodi II (1491 - 1529)

Borommaracha IV (1529 - 1533)

Ratchadathiratkuman (1533 - 1534)

Chairacha (1534 - 1546) m. 1.Chitwadi 2.Sri Sudachan

Kaeofa (1546 - 1548)

Maha Chakkaphat (1548 - 1568) m. Sri Suriyothai

Mahinthrathirat (1568 - 1569)

Maha Thammaracha (1569 - 1590) m. Wisutkasat

Naresuan the Great (1590 - 1605) m. 1.Mani Rattana 2.Ek Kasattri 3.Yodaya Mibaya

Ekathotsarot (1605 - 1610)

Sisaowaphak (1610 - 1611)

Songtham (1611 - 1628)

Chetthathirat (1628 - 1629)

Athittayawong (1629)

Prasatthong (1629 - 1656) m. Princess Sirithida

Chaofa Chai (1656)

Sisuthammaracha (1656)

Narai the Great (1656 - 1688) m. Kasattri

Phetracha (1688 - 1703) m. 1.Kan, Princess Thephamat 2.Sudawadi, Princess Yothathep 3.Si Suphan, Princess Yothathip 4.Princess Kusawadi of Chiang Mai

Sanphet VIII (Sua) (1703 - 1708)

Phumintharacha (Thaisa) (1708 - 1732) m. Princess Rachanurak

Borommakot (1732 - 1758) m. 1.Aphainuchit 2.Phiphit Montri

Uthumphon (1758)

Ekkathat (1758 - 1767) m. Maengmao, the Princess Wimonphat

Thonburi:

Tak Sin (1767 - 1782) m. Princess Bhatborijarika

Ratanakosin (Dynastie Chakri):

Rama I. Phraphutthayotfa Chulalok (1782 - 1809) m. Amarindra

Rama II. Phraphutthaloetla Naphalai (1809 - 1824) m. 1.Sri Suriyendra 2.Kunthon Thipphayawadi 3.Sri Sulalai

Rama III. Phranangklao (1824 - 1851)

Rama IV. Phrachomklao - Mongkut (1851 - 1868) m. 1.Somanass Waddhanawathy 2.Debsirindra 3.Pannarai

Rama V. Phrachunlachomklao - Chulalongkorn (1868 - 1910) m. 1.Sunanda Kumariratana 2.Sukhumala Marasri 3.Savang Vadhana 4.Saovabha Phongsri

Rama VI. Phramongkutklao - Vajiravudh (1910 - 1925) m. 1.Sucharit Suda 2.Indrasakdi Sachi 3.Lakshamilavan 4.Suvadhana

Rama VII. Phrapokklao - Prajadhipok (1925 - 1935) m. Rambai Barni

Rama VIII. Ananda Mahidol (1935 - 19469

Rama IX. Bhumibol Adulyadej (1946 - 2016) m. Sirikit Kitiyakara

Rama X. Maha Vajiralongkorn (2016-) m. 1.Soamsawali Kitiyakara 2.Yuvadhida Polpraserth 3.Srirasmi Suwadee 4.Suthida Tidjai 5.Niramon Ounprom
